thread.title: Nancy Prickitt

author: Nancy Prickitt
title: Nancy Prickitt
text: I am an AirBnB host and a animal custodian. One of my AirBnB guests told me about Trusted Housesitters a few years ago. I absolutely refuse to kennel my animals when I am away and had been paying pretty steep pet-sitting fees when away for vacation or business. When both of my regular pet-sitters were engaged with other clients I decided to give TH a try. Am I ever happy I did!! I have used it three times now and besides having a new Go To list for pet sitters I have made a few wonderful friends! It truly is the best of the "Sharing" Economy. A real win-win for both sides.
